caption: I tried this place in the past with a friend and I am addicted since then. I love the awesome vibes and fresh food and beverages. Highly recommended.

We were a group of 2, ordered lamb and chicken biryani. Both were very delicious (a bit too spicy though we requested mild). Rice needed to be a bit drier than what was served, were told that it is how it's made in Northern India, it was so good, but wanted it to be drier :)

I celebrated my PhD last night in this great place. I am glad to say that it was a superb evening and the restaurant was definitely the reason for that fruitful event. The waiters  cooperated in a lovely style, the cooking was appetizing …
Had a excellent experience in this spot with my girlfriend. The food was served quick and the service is just excellent. Prices are fair.
